text:
Rating: 4/5

Overview: Tucked inside a boutique clothing store at Orchard, Plain Vanilla offers a cozy hideaway from the busy retail scene. It’s a charming, minimalist space that blends fashion and café culture into one understated experience.

Pros:

Great coffee & pastries: The quality lives up to Plain Vanilla’s reputation—smooth, well-brewed coffee and a small but delightful selection of pastries and baked goods.

Chic ambiance: Stylish and thoughtfully designed, the space feels intimate, with a warm blend of natural wood and soft lighting that matches the boutique setting.

Hidden gem vibe: Being part of a clothing shop makes it feel like a secret spot—perfect for a quick, quiet break.

Cons:

Very limited seating: Only around 4–5 small tables, typically for two people. It’s not ideal for groups or long stays, and seating might not always be available.

Compact layout: While cozy, the limited space means it's more suitable for a short visit than a full sit-down café experience.

Conclusion: Plain Vanilla at Orchard is a lovely, curated spot for a quality coffee and pastry break, especially if you enjoy quiet, well-designed spaces. Just be prepared for limited seating and a quick stop rather than a full café session.

I had a fantastic experience at Plain Vanilla! The friendly staff made me feel welcome right away.

I tried the strawberry white chocolate cupcake, and it was absolutely delicious ,perfectly sweet and rich. Paired with a cappuccino that was equally amazing, it was the perfect treat.

With a great variety of cupcakes as well as proper meals to have a nice brunch to pair with the drinks, I can’t wait to go back! Highly recommend!
small, quiet & cosy cafe inside good company shop. tried tea. my friend ordered a cupcake n was told nice. their spread of cupcakes & pastries look very appealing and reasonably priced

Extremely poor hygiene. Multiple flies in the food display and landed on several cupcakes. Told the staff and yet they don't seem to care much.

Such a pity because I loved their cupcakes but this is a disappointment.

Coffee is good.
Cake is just normal but pound cake is good.
Tables/ seats are limited but if you get a seat, it is good to take a break during a shopping.
